title: Not getting daily quests? (yasuo vs riven)
body:
For the past week I haven't been getting any daily quests for the yasuo vs riven event when apparently I should be?
Is the even over or are there prerequisites to getting the quests every day??

replies.body: You haven't been getting missions since the [**VS Event ended on 6/29/2017**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017). Be sure to check up on the event pages for the dates that they run.
